meanings.sent1: The nicknamers in our group always come up with funny names for everyone.
meanings.sent2: The nicknamers at school are known for their creativity in naming people.
meanings.sent3: The nicknamers decided to call the quiet student 'Whisper' to bring some humor to the class.
meanings.sent4: The nicknamers were like artists, painting colorful names on each person they met.
meanings.sent5: The nicknamers' talent for creating memorable monikers made them popular among their friends.

meanings.definition: Those who create nicknames for others.
meanings.sent1: We all laughed at the nicknamers' latest creation for our teacher.
meanings.sent2: The nicknamers in the office had a habit of assigning quirky names to their colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The nicknamers decided to call the boss 'Captain Serious' to lighten the mood in the office.
meanings.sent4: The nicknamers' words were like magic spells, transforming ordinary names into something special.
meanings.sent5: The nicknamers' ability to come up with fitting names for everyone amazed those around them.
